website_summaries.verdict: The middle-of-the-road option to add a complete infotainment system to your vehicle if you can live without more higher-end features like built-in navigation.
pros: The large touchscreen display is easy to see and use from both front seats of a typical vehicle
Connects and charges various devices such as Android and Apple phones from the front USB port
Compatible with a variety of aftermarket backup cameras
cons: The infotainment system will not work with older car models that only have a single din space for the stereo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice stereo. Never installed one before but did the entire job in less than 30 minutes in my 2002 tacoma with Metra 70-1761 harness, didn't need any other parts. Bluetooth hasn't disconnected yet, always automatically connects within 10 seconds of starting my truck. Touchscreen works as well as a modern phone display is bright and clear, lots of options, extremely fast software with no lag, choose any color you want for the buttons. Had a tough time choosing a stereo but really happy I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: RJ42

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This deck does not disappoint. call quality is good with the microphone the bluetooth for music works well. it connects with my samsung phone within 30 seconds of me getting in the car if i have bluetooth on. Installation was painless as well. I would purchase this stereo again for another vehicle if i was in the market
customer_reviews.author: Justsomeguy

customer_reviews.title: Super lighting fast interface! This thing is no joke
customer_reviews.text: VERRRRRRRRRRY SNAPPY AND FAST INTERFACE I WAS BLOWN AWAY.MY BUDDY HAS SIMILAR MODEL THATS LIKE 2 OR 3 YEARS ONLY AND WOWW IT MAKES A HUGE DIFFERENCE. CANT SAY ENOUGH HIW IMPRESSED I AM WOTH THE SPEED OF THIS THING WHEN YOU CLICK ANY BUTTONS ON SCREEN IT GOES THERE INSTANTANEOUSLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Black display screen but can be fixed by keeping ignition switch in the on position and disconnecting the battery then reconnect
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up. Installed myself with metra dash kit for my Toyota Tacoma and sounds great! Had a hiccup with display not turning on but it's been fixed and hasn't done it since. Dropped a star because of that. Do yourself a favor and buy a cheap 2 prong switch if you want to view DVD while driving because it won't let you view it. Wire the green parking brake wire to it along with the ground and your set.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Walczak

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great features for this pricepoint. You can purchase one of the generic pioneer remotes for it or metra steering wheel connection. It has inputs for external video input, aux, usb, video out, rca preamp outs. plenty of color options to match your vehicle's interior. limited backgrounds. This does include a decent mic for the bluetooth features. It will pick up any road noise in your cabin though. IE quieter car equals better call quality.
customer_reviews.author: BozSC

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to do and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get the “harmony” wiring harness for my 2003 xterra with the Rockford Fosgate amp set up. But, after some delicate time and proper wiring and fine tuning. It worked out great. Amp, speakers and stereo works great. Also, I got the parking brake bypass wiring as well so my kids can watch movies while driving. Also, I have a vox camera wired system and wired it to the radio just fine and all works great. So everything came together pretty good and I’m over all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Redding

customer_reviews.title: Must buy any mounting brackets separately.
customer_reviews.text: Decent double din for the price. Installed in our travel trailer that had no dvd player. Would as intended and with a bit of modification to the trailer it fits right in. I wish I would have known it did not come with a mounting sleeve/cage. I had to buy that else where at $45 extra. It all worked out but would have maybe looked into options that had it all together. It gave me what I need as far as features for the trailer. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent purchase for the money! I made a boombox with this that sounds very good. Instead of using a preamp out to a powered subwoofer, you can use one of the rear speakers and tell this pioneer that it is a subwoofer and then set up your crossover! Love that feature. It gets pretty loud and has a lot of power. The DVD works great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Easter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase and the quality of the unit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase and the quality of the unit. Had to contact Pioneer support for an install problem and they are fabulous. This is considered an entry level Head Unit but it has all the functions I need with no additional devices required. Bluetooth I am told sounds better that some OEM units~!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Still a great model!
customer_reviews.text: 2007 Tundra. While an older model this is still a great deck. Love that the lights are adjustable got mine to match the orange cluster lights. Looks like it came with the truck. Offers LOTS of adjustments. Once you get it dialed in you’ll love it. Recommend pairing it with an sub. Pioneer makes a 12” powered sub that cost around $130 that is perfect for this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Jovanna Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great radio
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful radio. I thought my speakers were shot as well but when I installed this radio I knew immediately that was the only issue. It looks very nice, and I like that it doesnt come out. You can adjust the volume type to your liking. The bluetooth connects automatically and it's just wonderful. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: Great options and sound quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought pioneer receivers and this one will not let you down. Paired with amplified door speakers and sub/s you can't go wrong. Pioneer head units are unmatched IMHO and after 20 years of using/installing them nothing else compares sound wise, even with their cheapest head units from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: ByteMe Networking

customer_reviews.title: Great great great sound! Options.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this radio. Sure others say its missing features. But the dang sound options are ridiculous. Crossovers, slope, outputs, fading, all per channel. You can get full rms with no distortion. I'm adding a amp soon but as the radio sits its Great all by itself.
customer_reviews.author: gadget_boy

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say. Bought one for one of my cars, then not long after, bought another one. Nothing super fancy but bluetooth works great. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: KelBel

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but not all features work.
customer_reviews.text: head unit sounds great in my car but after following instructions and watching tutorials we could not get the backup camera to work. I tow a lot of trailers often by myself and having a backup camera is a life saver so I will probably be switching to a different head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth ever dime "heads up!!! dont look for an instilation cage bezzel or remote!!"
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 4 stars for instilation mainly because it dosent come with a cage or a bezel. Other flaw is a remote are they really that costy that u couldnt include one Pioneer!! other than that perfect product auper easy to use real nice sound qulity for the pre amp voltage and super clear video would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Connor

customer_reviews.title: Radio Replacement Interface needed for some vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headunit. Although the 2008 and 2009 Mustangs need the PAC C2R-FRD1 radio replacement interface to have accessory power available when the ignition is turned off. Had trouble before finding that out. After installing that interface the headunit works well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Watson

customer_reviews.title: Recieved differant model number
customer_reviews.text: Works very well looks nice hard to get video to play need to lower res. A little thrown off when recieving a different model number looks the same but differant model number than what I purchased regardless works well and sounds good
customer_reviews.author: Jason leamer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for 200 dollars the only thing I hated doing was connecting the new harness to the unit so it would fit my 2005 toyota highlander. But overall the system itself is really good the sound is good and the touch screen is good. It took my about an hour to install. Also I bought a camera for it and the display shows the rear view camera everytime and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong for the $$ Install kit suck-have to modify but this unit is well made and can do everything. microphone wired thru A pillar/bypass and all good. nice unit for $
customer_reviews.author: inFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect call quality
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, spend the extra $40 and get this stereo over the Boss. Perfect call quality, and you will swear you are running a amp the way the speakers hit. half the time I don't even turn on the subwoofer!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Decent radio
customer_reviews.text: Decent radio. I like the EQ settings. Shipping took an extra week. Radio does NOT have Apple car play like some of the reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing unit, touchscreen is crazy responsive. Best double din out for the price. No issues, picks up my phones Bluetooth within seconds. Has dual outputs for sub amp and 4 channel amp.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Usb cable  may cause the wireless backup camera not to work
customer_reviews.text: With the supplied usb cable plugged into the unit it caused the wireless backup camera not to work. With the cable removed the separately purchased wireless worked fine. Other than that the unit works as expected and the choice of screen colors correspond with my dash lights.
customer_reviews.author: darold baum

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Easy to Install and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the unit, love the fact that you can change colors of the illumination, the screen response is very fast and efficient. If I can just figure out why I can't get Bluetooth to work I will give it 5 stars. I purchased this unit and install seemed pretty straight forward. I cannot however get the phone to sync via Bluetooth. When I select Bluetooth from the Mode menu it says "NO SIGNAL". Do you have to have the parking brake wire connected in order to get Bluetooth function out of the radio? I didn't connect that wire and I'm starting to think that is the issue. Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: It's decent not much other than that
customer_reviews.text: Decent head unit, has Bluetooth and sub control and eq, other than that there isn't much.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Pioneer ever since I could remember! Always the best quality and bang for your buck..... I highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great as expected Bluetooth connect ad I got in the car radio has no lag. Sound quality and tuneability is pioneer quality. Note: just get the parking break bypass before even installing this radio then it's smooth sailing. Delivery was fast too thank you
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Decent radio easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good radio for the price point. Easy to install the radio itself with the correct dash kit. Used ASWC-1 steering wheel adapter and the Metra wiring bus. This can be a tad overwhelming but just do a little research and it goes right together.
customer_reviews.author: John Cox

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this Loser
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor quality radio. Reception is awful (AM)... . even worse than my previous cheap Chinese radio. What good are all the fancy features (boost, EQ, balance, bass, loudness, etc) if you cannot even pick up a local channel? Back up camera does not work either. I wasted money on this loser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winning
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is probably the best car stereo on the market. Very responsive touchscreen, 3 RCA outputs, turns on fairly quick, 13 band EQ, and with a cheap $13 mod can still use touchscreen while car is in drive.
customer_reviews.author: LSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade or replacement Thor a stock radio.
customer_reviews.text: Wife and kids were very excited to new t only have a radio back in her 04 F250 after the stock one went bad. They loved the upgrade to this guy being able to watch DVD and the fact it will output to a large screen monitor using rca cables is an additional plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working almost immediately, screen went black and wouldnt do anything. Sent back to amazon and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Overall great radio head unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy install in my 2005 f150. The touch screen response is great. Easy and quick Bluetooth connection to my phone. Sounds better than stock head unit.
customer_reviews.author: BADHAM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a sony xplod, couldnt be happier easy to use and set up, hands free bluetooth is a nice feature , make sure you add the 10 dollar parking brake bypass
customer_reviews.author: Brandon weston

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice nice
customer_reviews.text: Best radio I've had and I've had a good many but there is so many options for everything you could imagine. Overall 9 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this refurbished and it's perfect! It runs great, sounds amazing! Easy to use. 9.5/10 would recommend. Touch screen isn't as sensitive as I would like but doesn't effect performance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick H.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of playing around to figure out why the videos were not playing but once that was figured out the deck was great!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio, for the money!
customer_reviews.text: this radio has more adjustments then my home stereo has, awesome! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Sobczak

customer_reviews.title: just remember it's usually a better product when all the information is openly disclosed and ...
customer_reviews.text: Folks when you see these brands that you've never heard of that are made in a country you can't pronounce that cost $3 instead of $300, just remember it's usually a better product when all the information is openly disclosed and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Dean Berry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/navigate
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo for the price. Easy to use and even easier to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great sounds great
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this stereo out of the thousand options. It looks and sounds great. The stereo came with almost everything I needed to install it so I’m a very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer does it again!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice double din. By pass switch was easy to install and configure, Now I will be enjoying movies on roadtrips. 13 band equalizer is very easy to use and customize. Installation is really easy if you have installed a car stereo before. For the price and what you get do not pass this up you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped working within a year
customer_reviews.text: Decent unit, but I received an Error 10 that will no longer allow the Bluetooth to work. I have tried to troublehsooting options, and the problem persists. As this is the main way I use the receiver, it is pretty much useless. I would not recommend buying when there are so many better options.
customer_reviews.author: James Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for $150
customer_reviews.text: Great Unit, Good sound, easy pairing. Microphone could be better, but 4 star for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: not new
customer_reviews.text: radio has all signs that it was not new. didnt come with the screws that hold the cd housing inside the radio, no factory screen film and some cables were cut off and not labeled, some hand written. reverse input stopped working. would not recommend for the price. seller if you are reading this, please issue an exchange. thank you
customer_reviews.author: melvin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like how the stereo picks up Bluetooth signals from my little Mp3 player
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good radio, everything is great. Bluetooth works fine, aux is fine, i had to get an adapter for the antenna. And the usb port does not work with samsung lightning cables.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gonzales JR

customer_reviews.title: Great value receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a budget system. Love the time alignment. Thanks again Pioneer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Way Too Critical

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement multimedia head unit for your vehicle. A lot of features and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a pleasure to have some new technology in a old school car i would recommend this product to others ind would not hesitate to ...
customer_reviews.text: the unit doe's every thing it was intended to do , it is a pleasure to have some new technology in a old school car i would recommend this product to others ind would not hesitate to buy another one . thank you pioneer
customer_reviews.author: fred diehl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as is from description and works as it should. Kingston, Jamaica
customer_reviews.author: Leighton A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very basic unit. Interface may not appeal to some.
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 4 stars due to its lack of features and wallpaper options. On screen display is very basic and cannot be configured at all. The unit works well and fit nicely. Should have no issue mounting in most double din openings. Bluetooth connection was quick and worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: enjoytheridedc2

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality just wish I could set my own backgrounds. Other than that everything works perfect very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Brusnahan

customer_reviews.title: Ok radio
customer_reviews.text: Good radio for the price but the screen goes black from time to time then comes back on idk why it does it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super nice dash and can’t complain about the price only thing it should have came with a remote I think
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: deff. worth the price i put it in a 07 wrangler and its a perfect addition
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy86

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit for the money. EQ is easy to use. Menus are easy to navigate and have a ton of features. Screen is bright, steering wheel controls and bluetooth are perfect. All in all awesome unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A lot of tuning options. Only bad part is that there is no custom background option but it ok.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use and wonderful sound!
customer_reviews.text: It was a wonderful Birthday gift for the special person in my life and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: singlelady

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lasting a year and more.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a year back for our 2010 Honda Civic DX-VP. The bluetooth works great for our Iphones on long drives. We use the radio sometimes and it serves the purpose. You can change color themes on the display as well. Works great so far. No issues. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: sumit bhattacharya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: At a price of under $200 this is a great buy. Installation was done in a 2009 Nissan Cube and setup was easy. The touchscreen is very responsive and Bluetooth calling has good clarity. Pioneer stereo quality is always great!
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works we intended however, when I attempt to clear the connected Bluetooth device list, the unit just locks up.
customer_reviews.author: James A Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Works well but looks crappy without a bezel
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find a bezel that fits this. That's the only reason for 4 stars and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: josh Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Would have worked great but my car is difficult so i could not wire it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Harrity

customer_reviews.title: Very nice double din dash
customer_reviews.text: Very nice double din dash. Only reason I rated four is because it didn't come with a remote. Easy to put on a Mazda 3
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible radio
customer_reviews.text: Horrible radio shuts on and off can’t do nothing in the settings and no remote
customer_reviews.author: Astria S white

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Touch is a little slow but sound is great and so is the customizability
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little head unit specially the price and great features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget friendly head unit
customer_reviews.text: It have all the basic functions of a good head unit. It has a visible monitor even on direct sunlight. Drastically improves audio sound as compared to stock head unit. And most important, its cheap. Worth every penny. Period
customer_reviews.author: Luther Ellasus Narvarte

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: There are ZERO instructions on how to connect your cell phone to the radio for Bluetooth capability. The product is exactly what was to be expected. Bothered by the lack of setup instructions but an overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is that it’s a little dim in daylight but that’s common.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The first months it worked perfectly but then it stopped out of no where the screen completely froze.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level media deck for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. Works flawlessly so far. Great entry level media deck for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Radio quit coming on
customer_reviews.text: Radio won't come on after maybe using it 10 times very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Marcus M.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit. I bypassed the e brake stop by running a switch to ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound great quality. Can never go wrong with pioneer
customer_reviews.author: Jermayne Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It is of very good quality
customer_reviews.text: not very good quality when you play the music you stop
customer_reviews.author: Juvenal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for so cheap...my old pioneer remote control works on this...incase you don't know the difference between the ex200 and ex201 is the 201 has a remote...Make sure you get a line driver along with this head unit...
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has everything you need: bluetooth, video, radio, usb, rear camera, aux
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled! Very very nice unit for the money. Great quality and easy to navigate. can't beat it for he price
customer_reviews.author: brickersbooty

customer_reviews.title: Ballin' on a budget
customer_reviews.text: The CD player was easy to install and so far so good. Great CD player for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Wolf

customer_reviews.title: It does its job - no other features like its predecessors
customer_reviews.text: It does its job - no other features like its predecessors. I miss AppPadio and the ability to use Waze or a GPS with tis product. What you see is what you get. Its a radio, and a bluetooth phone and thats it. Can't hate it but I really enjoyed the older models. Nonetheless, its a cheap radio that does its job well and simply.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and function
customer_reviews.text: This Pioneer product sounds so good and works great as a replacement in my 2000 4runner. Can really hear quality improvement over original. So far easy to use after a week. Bluetooth phone is clear for people I call. Display seems well balanced for brightness and clarity day and night. Lots of personalized settings. Very pleased. Be sure to buy the wiring harness to plug into your vehicle. Used the brackets from original radio, perfect fit to dash. Easy to install if you are handy with gadgets and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: KDB

customer_reviews.title: to get best results you should also get new speakers
customer_reviews.text: Kevin C I upgraded my 1996 Cadillac DeVille this is a wonderful product easy to install the Bluetooth automatically hooked up to my phone And I purchased a bypass for my stereo so that my passengers can look at movies while we're out or taking long trips the sound is awesome I clearly got more for my 💰 then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Basic
customer_reviews.text: All of the features didn't work. There are cheaper and better units out there.
customer_reviews.author: lezlethal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing radio! I love it a good entry level ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing radio! I love it a good entry level radio with alot of percs would definitely recommend for anyone who's looking for a good entry level radio
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, came with a handsfree phone setup also! Great purchase and pretty simple install!
customer_reviews.author: adam vincent

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with it is it doesnt catch any radio channels
customer_reviews.author: Adam T.

customer_reviews.title: Great car stereo for the price but lacking basic features
customer_reviews.text: Great car stereo for the price but lacking basic features. Pros - Great sound. 12 set equalizer Many radio presets Video is clear Bluetooth works well Easy to install Cons - Mounting brackets are almost worthless No custom wallpaper/background Interface is clunky
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great. worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit. It really has a lot of options and settings to tune the sound to your liking. It does have sub control, and a true 10 tone equalizer. The interface feels a little dated, but it definitely doesn't feel outdated. Integrated CD / DVD player is nice. This unit does not have navigation but who needs that when we all have smartphones. The screen feels solid. It is fast, responsive and has never frozen or crashed. I dont think there is a better looking and functional double din head unit out there for the money. PIONEER FOR THE WIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent head unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is a great buy for the money. The WVGA display is easy to read in nearly all lighting conditions, even on bright, sunny days. The screen brightness also dims to a comfortable level at night when the headlights & dash lights are on. The only time it's difficult to see is when bright sunlight is shining directly on the screen. The touchscreen is very responsive, and the Bluetooth feature consistently links up to my iPhone in no more than 7-8 seconds. Sound quality is as good as more expensive units, and video resolution is good. Installation is very easy with the correct harness adapter. Overall, I would recommend this Pioneer unit.
customer_reviews.author: Raynman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: I did have to splice in the new harness, though I already had an older model Pioneer HU, the new harness just did not fit. Bluetooth is fine, you people are too picky. I don't have any delays, though maybe I'm just old enough to remember what a delay really is. Sounds good, has all the settings you need. LPF, HPF and a nifty favorites menu for my sub.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: 2003 Ford f150
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit if you buy the dash kit no complains about the radio is pioneer you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: agavila300blk

customer_reviews.title: Great deck, a lil tedious install.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward install but a bit tedious to get it to mount in the right spot. Not just a simple drop in like a single din unit, this one you guess and check the fit until it's right. It's really nice having a backup camera kick on automatically (I wired the deck and backup cams trigger wires from the car rev lights). Unless your a moron driver don't bother hooking the brake wire up it only shuts off features, I thought it might have an auxiliary p break warning sign...
customer_reviews.author: wes473

customer_reviews.title: Go buy this
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The picture on this radio while playing movies is beyond dope. I brought the parking brake bypass so I could have the option of using DVD player. Bluetooth connects quickly and the controls on the radio are very easy to use. Great buy for the money. Highly recommend this. I had it installed in a 2000 Ford F-150.
customer_reviews.author: Town

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer head units have served me well over the years. This head unit is no different. Easy to read touch-screen, steering wheel controls compatible, back up camera compatible & clean installation & sound. I have the factory interior speakers running with a mono block amplifier with a 12 inch Bazooka passive basstube. Nice clean sound! Highly recommend this stereo!
customer_reviews.author: IsaAmonRa

customer_reviews.title: this radio works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio to replace another brand, it has exceeded my expectations, and connects very quickly to my phone, this is a great radio!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even work
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t work, they sent a replacement but I’m nervous after the first defective one. I would just avoid this
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good head unit.Good price not over priced. This has to be my favorite in several years. I put this on in my Jeep and I am going to order another one for my daughter Tacoma.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Pioneer AVH-200EX Multimedia DVD Receiver with 6.2" WVGA Display, and Built-in Bluetooth
product_meta.description: The AVH-200EX is an entry-level in-dash multimedia a/v receiver designed to improve in-vehicle entertainment and connectivity with your smartphone. Enjoy features such as built-in Bluetooth AVRCP 1. 6 for hands-free calling and audio streaming. Audio/video playback from USB and DVD sources and safety features such as back up camera ready and much more
